description: These beef and black bean burritos make for a quick and healthy Mexican inspired dinner.
name: Beef & Black Bean Burritos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon chilli mix into the middle of each tortilla, add rice and any other toppings you like, fold over each end, roll up and serve.
